name: Long Gone Days
description: A 2D modern-day character-driven RPG that imagines the world of war that's coming for us, told from the perspective of civilians and deserters, with a focus on language barriers and their emotional struggles.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2 Ghz dual core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with dedicated memory, 1GB memory recommended Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 2 Ghz dual core Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with dedicated memory, 1GB memory recommended Storage: 2 GB available space
